This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1177 Sq.
Ft.
Come home to quiet, comfortable living and generous amenities at Villas at West Ridge in Lithia Springs, Georgia.

Our friendly community offers 1, 2 and 3 bedroom homes for rent in five inviting floor plans, all featuring kitchens with frost-free refrigerators with ice makers, bedrooms with ceiling fans, roomy closets and plenty of storage space.
Some homes offer patios/balconies and attached garages.
Villas at West Ridge is located in Lithia Springs, Georgia and is a short drive to Interstate 20, with quick access to downtown Atlanta, C-Tran and Marta public transit.
Premier shopping at Arbor Place Mall and Shopping Centers on Chapel Hill and much more!
University of West Georgia, West Central Tech., Mercer and Strayer are only a short commute from our community along with major industries such as Lockheed Martin and Dobbins Air Force Base.
Here you can expect to rent a home in a community that is warm, inviting, attentive, and convenient to all that Lithia Springs living has to offer.
A new life of luxury is moments away at Villas at West Ridge on Lee Road.
Call today to schedule a tour of your new apartment home in the heart of Lithia Springs.
Features:

Washer/Dryer Available*, Private Patio or Balcony, Crown Molding, Attached Garages w/ Private Entry*, Window Blinds, Separate Dining Area, Ceiling Fans, Nine-foot Ceilings, Newly Renovated Apartment Homes*, Garden Tubs*, FF Refrigerator with Icemaker, Hardwood-Style Plank Flooring, Prewired for Intrusion Alarm, Built-In Desks, Walk-In Closets, Fully Equipped Kitchen, Built-In Computer Desk, Open Breakfast Bar and Pantry, Hardwood Floors*, 9 Ft.
Ceilings w/Crown Molding, Full-Size Washer/Dryer Connections, Pre-Cable Ready
*in select units
Community Amenities:

Resident Business Center, Central Mail Stations, Fitness Center, Saline Resort-Style Swimming Pool, Controlled Access Gates, Sprinklered Buildings, Laundry Facility, Resident Clubhouse, Playground, Car Care Center with Vacuum, 32 Attached Direct Access Garages, Central Trash Compactor, 12 Detached Garages, Picnic Area with Grills
Pet Policy
We welcome 2 pets (cats/dogs) per apartment home.
There is a $300 non-refundable pet deposit.
Pet rent is $10 per month.
There is a weight limit of 40 pounds per pet.
Please see a Leasing Associate to learn more about weight and breed restrictions.
